chrome_extension_name.description: Extension name, used in the Web Store

chrome_extension_description.description: Extension description, used in the Web Store
chrome_extension_description.message: Privacy settings data collector for an undergraduate thesis. No sensitive data is collected.

app_objective.message: This is an extension to assist in collecting browser privacy settings. These data will be used for study in an undergraduate thesis. Please note that only configuration parameters are captured, that is, no personal or confidential data is being collected from the browser. It will be collected if the following options are active or inactive:

send_data.description: Send privacy data options button description

send_data_limit_reached.description: Send privacy data options api limit reached
send_data_limit_reached.message: Failed to send data. Api limit already reached. Please, try again later.

data_already_sent.message: You have already participated in this data collection. Thank you.
